title: OpenSSL License (OpenSSL)
description: A BSD-style license tailored specifically for OpenSSL software. This license has a special “advertising clause” saying that advertising materials mentioning features or use of the software must display an acknowledgment. This license is only used for the OpenSSL project, and applies side-by-side with the SSLeay license, which is almost identical.

cannot.description: Describes the warranty and if the software/license owner can be charged for damages.

cannot.description: Describes the allowance of using contributors' names, trademarks or logos.

can.title: Distribute
